repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a comentary on the Viṣṇusahasranāma written by SrīŚaṅkarācārya. Number 15 and 27 at the back cover in pencil.

msItem.title: Viṣṇusahasranāmabhāṣya
msItem.author: Śaṅkarācārya
msItem.incipit: 1v 1 sahasramurtteḥ. phuruṣottamasya sahasranetrānanapādabāhoḥ . sahasranāmastavanaṃ praśastaṃ nirūcyate . janmajarādi śāntyai (gap of approximately 12 syllables as the edge is broken.) 1v2 śaṃpāyana vāca dharmānabhyudayaniḥśreyasahetubhutān..
msItem.explicit: 46v 8 tyaśeṣata iti śamādi saṃpat saṃyuktaiḥ dhyeyo yaḥ puruṣottamaḥ tasmai namostu kṛṣṇāyasaṃsārakleśanāśine ..
msItem.finalRubric: 46v 8 iti śrīgovindabhagavatpūjyapādaśīṣyaparamahaṃsaparivrā 46v 9 jakācāryaśrīmatśaṃkarapujyapādakṛtaṃ sahasranāmabhāṣyaṃ samāptaṃ .. … oṃ śrīmahāgaṇapaye namaḥ

support.p: thin palm leaf used as cover. the front cover is damaged so it is supported with other palm leaf.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 2 blank folio and 46 written

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin.

handNote.desc: small and sharp characters neatly written.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin on 1v.
Front cover at centre : 1 śrīmacchaṃkarācāryaviracitaśrīviṣṇu 2 sahasranāmabhāṣyapustakaṃ .. ..

listBibl.bibl: Vishnu Sahasranama with The Bhasya of Sri Shankaracharya Translated into English in the light of Bhasya of Sri Shankaracharya by R Ananthakrishna Shastri. The Adyar library and Research centre. Adyar Madras 1980.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.

TEI.text:
1v 1 śrīmatbhyo gurubhyo namaḥ sahasramurtteḥ. phuruṣottamasya sahasranetrānanapādabāhoḥ . sahasranāmastavanaṃ praśastaṃ nirūcyate . janmajarādi śāntyai (gap of approximately 12 syllables as the edge is broken.) 1v2 śaṃpāyana vāca dharmānabhyudayaniḥśreyasahetubhutān..
46v 8 tyaśeṣata iti śamādi saṃpat saṃyuktaiḥ dhyeyo yaḥ puruṣottamaḥ tasmai namostu kṛṣṇāyasaṃsārakleśanāśine .. iti śrīgovindabhagavatpūjyapādaśīṣyaparamahaṃsaparivrā 46v 9 jakācāryaśrīmatśaṃkarapujyapādakṛtaṃ sahasranāmabhāṣyaṃ samāptaṃ .. … oṃ śrīmahāgaṇapaye namaḥ
